content.question: In Shibboleth, Doris Salcedo created an experience of alienation by

choices.label: constructing a vertical barrier between two distinct spaces to separate viewers from each other
manipulating the sound and air quality in the gallery to isolate viewers from each other
surrounding viewers with unreadable text to reference the idea of cultural exclusion
opening a concrete fissure in the floor to interrupt the walking space of viewers

content.answer: opening a concrete fissure in the floor to interrupt the walking space of viewers

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
